page.title: 19EALING NORTHN SPORTS CENTRE
page.content:
{Ealing Northern Sports Centre}was a social and sports centre for the people who worked for J.Lyons Ltd.It became a public sports centre when it was bought by the London Borough of Ealing in 1967.
{The Main Hall}was used for ballroom dancing which was very popular then but now it is used for gymnastics, badminton,judo,karate,short tennis and trampolining.The stage is used for golf practice and sometimes for pantomimes and other entertainments.
There is a{bar}in the main building so the teachers and other people can have a drink after a long days work.A sauna and a solarium are also nearby for anyone who wants to relax.
